data.message: Terrence Sampson go through the comments and you'll see 90% of the African American comments agree with me lol. Why is it so hard to admit Eminem = greatest gift to hip hop? Lol

replies.message: Grew up, listening to Hip-hop, from the D.  I've lived in NYC, Brooklyn and currently I'm in LA.  I've worked in the music industry, produced the Hip-Hop Honors Awards, hung with Snoop, Grand Master Flash, Kendrick, TI, Luda, The Game and the Wu and many many more.  From what I've learned through the years is, if you don't think Eminem is the real deal you're just ignorant and have no clue what real hip-hop is.
